Juli\u00e1n Castro: s claim was based on a national DACA survey conducted by the left-leaning Center for American Progress.
The survey included 3: 063 DACA recipients from 46 states, including Texas.
According to the survey results: 91.4% of respondents said they were currently employed, with 55.9% of those stating they hadn't been employed before DACA.
The survey also found that 44: 9% of respondents were currently in school, while 55% were not.
